long_description: Lightweight and durable, the Tifosi Dolomite 2.0 Fototec Photochromic Sunglasses feature variable tint technology to adjust rapidly to changing light conditions for superior clarity and protection. Light Night photochromic lenses feature clear-to-smoke lenses that transition easily from dawn to dusk; 75.9 - 27.7% range of light transmission. Grilamid TR-90 homopolyamide nylon frames offer extremely high bending strength, low density and high resistance to chemical and UV damage. Hydrophilic rubber ear and nose pieces for no-slip stability; adjustable temples and nose pieces for custom fit. The Tifosi Dolomite 2.0 Fototec Photochromic Sunglasses feature vented lenses that improve air circulation and help prevent fogging.
short_description: Lightweight and durable, the Tifosi Dolomite 2.0 Fototec Photochromic Sunglasses feature variable tint technology to adjust rapidly to changing light conditions for superior clarity and protection.
